results.title: Simvastatin prevents articular chondrocyte dedifferentiation induced by nitric oxide by inhibiting the expression of matrix metalloproteinases 1 and 13.
results.text_hl: These effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVT@@@ on dedifferentiation suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVT@@@ may be used as a drug for the cure of @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@.
